newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Philippine Airlines to set US$100 mln FRN.
newsitem.headline: Philippine Airlines to set US$100 mln FRN.

text.p: Philippine Airlines has mandated AB Capital Markets and Deutsche Morgan Grenfell to arrange a US$100 million floating rate note issue, bankers said.
The issue will be formally launched on December 4.
AMOUNT US$100 MLN COUPON 6ML+200 BP MATURITY 3 YRS
TYPE FRN ISS PRICE PAR LAUNCH 04.DEC.96
PUTS NONE CALLS NONE REPLIES 2 WKS
RATINGS -- SALE LMTS STANDARD TAX PROV --
NEG PLG YES CRS DEF YES FORCE MAJ YES
HOME CTRY PHILIPPINES GOV LAW ENGLISH PAY DATE JAN.97
SENIOR CO-LEAD MGRS US$15 MLN 75 BP ALL-IN 225 BP
CO-LEAD MGRS US$10-15 MLN 50 BP ALL-IN 216.6 BP
SENIOR MGRS US$5-10 MLN 30 BP ALL-IN 210 BP
MANAGERS US$5 MLN 15 BP ALL-IN 205 BP
ARRANGERS AB CAPITAL MARKETS AND DEUTSCHE MORGAN GRENFELL
